summary: Westminster Abbey is a famous church in London, England. It has been an important place for many English and British kings and queens. The church has a long history, starting in the 10th century with Benedictine monks. The current building was started in 1245. Many famous people are buried there, like kings, prime ministers, and scientists. Its architecture is beautiful, mixing different styles. The abbey, along with nearby buildings, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
title: Westminster Abbey
